prompts.prompt: Once upon a time, in a small yard, there was a small daisy. The daisy had a name.

outputs.full_output: Once upon a time, in a small yard, there was a small daisy. The daisy had a name. Her name was Daisy. Daisy lived in a garden full of flowers. She loved to play with her friends.
outputs.continuation: Her name was Daisy. Daisy lived in a garden full of flowers. She loved to play with her friends.

prompts.prompt: Once upon a time, in a small house, there lived a kind and honest girl named Lily. She loved to bake cakes for her friends and family.

outputs.full_output: Once upon a time, in a small house, there lived a kind and honest girl named Lily. She loved to bake cakes for her friends and family. One day, Lily decided to make a big cake for her friend. Lily went to the store to mix cake, flour, and sugar. She mixed and mixed all the ingredients until it was time to bake.
outputs.continuation: One day, Lily decided to make a big cake for her friend. Lily went to the store to mix cake, flour, and sugar. She mixed and mixed all the ingredients until it was time to bake.

outputs.full_output: Once upon a time, in a small house, there lived a kind and honest girl named Lily. She loved to bake cakes for her friends and family. One day, Lily decided to make a big cake for her friend. Lily gathered all the cake, flour, sugar, and eggs in her kitchen. She mixed them all together and put them in the oven.
